00022 namespace {
00023 struct Range {
00024   int low;
00025   int high;
00026   std::vector<std::string> c;
00027 };
00028 
00029 int atohex(const char *s) {
00030   int n = 0;
00031 
00032   CHECK_DIE(std::strlen(s) >= 3
00033             && s[0] == '0' && (s[1] == 'x' || s[1] == 'X'))
00034       << "no hex value: " << s;
00035 
00036   const char *p = s;
00037   s += 2;
00038   while (*s) {
00039     int r = 0;
00040     if (*s >= '0' && *s <= '9')
00041       r = *s - '0';
00042     else if (*s >= 'A' && *s <= 'F')
00043       r = *s - 'A' + 10;
00044     else if (*s >= 'a' && *s <= 'f')
00045       r = *s - 'a' + 10;
00046     else
00047       CHECK_DIE(false) << "no hex value: " << p;
00048 
00049     n = 16 * n + r;
00050     s++;
00051   }
00052 
00053   return n;
00054 }
00055 
00056 CharInfo encode(const std::vector<std::string> &c,
00057                 std::map<std::string, CharInfo> *category) {
00058   CHECK_DIE(c.size()) << "category size is empty";
00059 
00060   std::map<std::string, CharInfo>::const_iterator it = category->find(c[0]);
00061   CHECK_DIE(it != category->end())
00062       << "category [" << c[0] << "] is undefined";
00063 
00064   CharInfo base = it->second;
00065   for (size_t i = 0; i < c.size(); ++i) {
00066     std::map<std::string, CharInfo>::const_iterator it =
00067         category->find(c[i]);
00068     CHECK_DIE(it != category->end())
00069         << "category [" << c[i] << "] is undefined";
00070     base.type += (1 << it->second.default_type);
00071   }
00072 
00073   return base;
00074 }
00075 }

00077 bool CharProperty::open(const Param &param) {
00078   const std::string prefix   = param.get<std::string>("dicdir");
00079   const std::string filename = create_filename(prefix, CHAR_PROPERTY_FILE);
00080   return open(filename.c_str());
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool CharProperty::open(const char *filename) {
00084   MMAP_OPEN(char, cmmap_, std::string(filename), "r");
00085 
00086   const char *ptr = cmmap_->begin();
00087   unsigned int csize;
00088   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, csize);
00089 
00090   size_t fsize = sizeof(unsigned int) +
00091       (32 * csize) + sizeof(unsigned int) * 0xffff;
00092 
00093   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(fsize == cmmap_->size())
00094       << "invalid file size: " << filename;
00095 
00096   clist_.clear();
00097   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < csize; ++i) {
00098     const char *s = read_ptr(&ptr, 32);
00099     clist_.push_back(s);
00100   }
00101 
00102   map_ = reinterpret_cast<const CharInfo *>(ptr);
00103 
00104   return true;
00105 }
00106 
00107 void CharProperty::close() {
00108   MMAP_CLOSE(char, cmmap_);
00109 }

00111 size_t CharProperty::size() const { return clist_.size(); }
00112 
00113 const char *CharProperty::name(size_t i) const {
00114   return const_cast<const char*>(clist_[i]);
00115 }

00119   charset_ = decode_charset(ct);

00122 int CharProperty::id(const char *key) const {
00123   for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<long>(clist_.size()); ++i)
00124     if (std::strcmp(key, clist_[i]) == 0) return i;
00125   return -1;
00126 }

00128 bool CharProperty::compile(const char *cfile,
00129                            const char *ufile,
00130                            const char *ofile) {
00131   char line[BUF_SIZE];
00132   char *col[512];
00133   size_t id = 0;
00134   std::vector<Range> range;
00135   std::map<std::string, CharInfo> category;
00136   std::vector<std::string> category_ary;
00137   std::ifstream ifs(cfile);
00138   std::istringstream iss(CHAR_PROPERTY_DEF_DEFAULT);
00139   std::istream *is = &ifs;
00140 
00141   if (!ifs) {
00142     std::cerr << cfile
00143               << " is not found. minimum setting is used" << std::endl;
00144     is = &iss;
00145   }
00146 
00147   while (is->getline(line, sizeof(line))) {
00148     if (std::strlen(line) == 0 || line[0] == '#') continue;
00149     size_t size = tokenize2(line, "\t ", col, sizeof(col));
00150     CHECK_DIE(size >= 2) << "format error: " << line;
00151 
00152     // 0xFFFF..0xFFFF hoge hoge hgoe #
00153     if (std::strncmp(col[0], "0x", 2) == 0) {
00154       std::string low = col[0];
00155       std::string high;
00156       size_t pos = low.find("..");
00157 
00158       if (pos != std::string::npos) {
00159         high = low.substr(pos + 2, low.size() - pos - 2);
00160         low  = low.substr(0, pos);
00161       } else {
00162         high = low;
00163       }
00164 
00165       Range r;
00166       r.low = atohex(low.c_str());
00167       r.high = atohex(high.c_str());
00168 
00169       CHECK_DIE(r.low >= 0 && r.low < 0xffff &&
00170                 r.high >= 0 && r.high < 0xffff &&
00171                 r.low <= r.high)
00172           << "range error: low=" << r.low << " high=" << r.high;
00173 
00174       for (size_t i = 1; i < size; ++i) {
00175         if (col[i][0] == '#') break;  // skip comments
00176         CHECK_DIE(category.find(std::string(col[i])) != category.end())
00177             << "category [" << col[i] << "] is undefined";
00178         r.c.push_back(col[i]);
00179       }
00180       range.push_back(r);
00181     } else {
00182       CHECK_DIE(size >= 4) << "format error: " << line;
00183 
00184       std::string key = col[0];
00185       CHECK_DIE(category.find(key) == category.end())
00186           << "category " << key << " is already defined";
00187 
00188       CharInfo c;
00189       std::memset(&c, 0, sizeof(c));
00190       c.invoke  = std::atoi(col[1]);
00191       c.group   = std::atoi(col[2]);
00192       c.length  = std::atoi(col[3]);
00193       c.default_type = id++;
00194 
00195       category.insert(std::make_pair<std::string, CharInfo>(key, c));
00196       category_ary.push_back(key);
00197     }
00198   }
00199 
00200   CHECK_DIE(category.size() < 18) << "too many categories(>= 18)";
00201 
00202   CHECK_DIE(category.find("DEFAULT") != category.end())
00203       << "category [DEFAULT] is undefined";
00204 
00205   CHECK_DIE(category.find("SPACE") != category.end())
00206       << "category [SPACE] is undefined";
00207 
00208   std::istringstream iss2(UNK_DEF_DEFAULT);
00209   std::ifstream ifs2(ufile);
00210   std::istream *is2 = &ifs2;
00211 
00212   if (!ifs2) {
00213     std::cerr << ufile
00214               << " is not found. minimum setting is used." << std::endl;
00215     is2 = &iss2;
00216   }
00217 
00218   std::set<std::string> unk;
00219   while (is2->getline(line, sizeof(line))) {
00220     size_t n = tokenizeCSV(line, col, 2);
00221     CHECK_DIE(n >= 1) << "format error: " << line;
00222     const std::string key = col[0];
00223     CHECK_DIE(category.find(key) != category.end())
00224         << "category [" << key << "] is undefined in " << cfile;
00225     unk.insert(key);
00226   }
00227 
00228   for (std::map<std::string, CharInfo>::const_iterator it = category.begin();
00229        it != category.end();
00230        ++it) {
00231     CHECK_DIE(unk.find(it->first) != unk.end())
00232         << "category [" << it->first << "] is undefined in " << ufile;
00233   }
00234 
00235   std::vector<CharInfo> table(0xffff);
00236   {
00237     std::vector<std::string> tmp;
00238     tmp.push_back("DEFAULT");
00239     CharInfo c = encode(tmp, &category);
00240     std::fill(table.begin(), table.end(), c);
00241   }
00242 
00243   for (std::vector<Range>::const_iterator it = range.begin();
00244        it != range.end();
00245        ++it) {
00246     CharInfo c = encode(it->c, &category);
00247     for (int i = it->low; i <= it->high; ++i)
00248       table[i] = c;
00249   }
00250 
00251   // output binary table
00252   {
00253     std::ofstream ofs(ofile, std::ios::binary|std::ios::out);
00254     CHECK_DIE(ofs) << "permission denied: " << ofile;
00255 
00256     unsigned int size = static_cast<unsigned int>(category.size());
00257     ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&size), sizeof(size));
00258     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it = category_ary.begin();
00259          it != category_ary.end();
00260          ++it) {
00261       char buf[32];
00262       std::fill(buf, buf + sizeof(buf), '\0');
00263       std::strncpy(buf, it->c_str(), sizeof(buf) - 1);
00264       ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(buf), sizeof(buf));
00265     }
00266     ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&table[0]),
00267               sizeof(CharInfo) * table.size());
00268     ofs.close();
00269   }
00270 
00271   return true;
00272 }
00273 }
